snippet.title: RADIO THE UNIVERSE - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]
announcing RADIO THE UNIVERSE
planned 2020 winter release
https://twitter.com/sixesixesixe
[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]

Wishlist here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1053900/Radio_the_Universe/

Preorder here:
https://sixesixesixe.itch.io/rtu

Mailing List here:
https://sixesixesixe.com

[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]

This trailer was shown at E3 which I attended in 2020.

The building where the expo took place was so beautiful. It had no electricity.

Fortunately I brought a laptop with a full battery. I was able to play this trailer seventy-five times on repeat. The audience was impossible to see in the dark but I could hear them cheering for me. Everyone was cheering. They cheered for nine hours.

I had never been to E3 before. I learned so much and met so many creative and interesting people. The engine room was haunted by ghosts.

After sunset, I unpacked my drapes and slept next to a rusty pipe. I drank tea from my thermos but the tea had long gone cold. I did not dream. The next morning I went outside and waited for a plane to take me back home. However no plane arrived. No plane was coming. There have never been any people here.

I stood in the long grass for many days and many nights in that barren field beyond the edge of town. I considered weeping but I could not find time for it on my Google Calendar. I'm so happy, thank you for your support.

Thanks,
- sixe
[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]
